column3: X became upset when he wanted to sit in a seat that someone else was sitting in and then began to throw a tantrum and then he got physically aggressive so 2 staff members restrained him in my class and I called for support. Myself and the rest of the support staff took the rest of the students in the hall until support came to remove him from the classroom.
I did not list physical intervention in the below area because I do not know how many minutes he was restrained for.
X was asked to give space to practice social distance. He became upset-tried to throw a chair at staff. Support called
X refused to let his yoga mat be put away. He began to throw chairs-unsafe Brought to time out- Eloped from TO at 9:25 and was brought back to TO

column4: running around classroom destroying property Support called

column3: X became unsafe during writing-throwing items in classroom when asked to take break in hall he threw all items off table
X Transitioning from quiet activity to writing. became non compliant-flipping chair
column4: kicking and hitting staff. Support called. Calming room used

column5: attempted to throw more items before leaving classroom. Support called
